examples.korean: The two sides called a truce to avoid further bloodshed. 발음듣기 양 진영은 더 이상의 유혈 사태를 피하기 위해 정전을 선포했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The two sides called a truce to avoid further bloodshed. 발음

examples.korean: He proclaimed himself emperor. 발음듣기 그는 스스로를 황제라고 선포했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The government has declared war on illiteracy. 발음듣기 정부가 문맹과의 전쟁을 선포했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has declared war on illiteracy. 발음

examples.korean: The president proclaimed a state of emergency. 발음듣기 대통령이 국가 비상사태를 선포했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The president proclaimed a state of emergency. 발음

examples.korean: The government has declared war on drug dealers. 발음듣기 정부가 마약상들에 대한 전쟁을 선포했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has declared war on drug dealers. 발음
